import java.math.BigInteger;
import java.util.Scanner;

class sata01 {
	public static void main(String args[] ){
		Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);
		int t = sc.nextInt();
		BigInteger b,k;
		
		while(t>0){
			b = sc.nextBigInteger();
			k = sc.nextBigInteger();
			if((b.mod(k)).equals(BigInteger.ZERO)) System.out.println("YES");
			else System.out.println("NO");
			t--;
		}
	}
}
